Perfect place to relax...but watch the mosquitos
reviews.text: We spent 10 days at the hotel at the end of September. We had a bungalow with private pool and terrace. Although I have stayed in more luxurious hotel rooms, the very private pool and very large terrace along with a very short walk to the private beach made for a winning combination. The beach is excellent and we virtually had it to ourselves while we were there. The water is very calm and clear and excellent for swimming, there is also full water sport facilities available. The staff were generally very polite and helpful, although there were a couple of exceptions, I put it down to it being the end of a long season.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The restaurants were ok, perhaps not as good as they maybe should have been for the money. We actually drove to the little town at the end of the road and were spoilt with excellent food.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We've just returned from a week at the Eagles Palace and as other reviews say, the hotel is stunning, the staff efficient & courteous, the interior & grounds are immaculate, the food is extremely good - great choice with different menus every night (e.g. Italian night, Seafood night, Greek night, Asian night etc).
reviews.title: Spectacular location for beach/pool holiday

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Our room was nice, perhaps a little small and the furnishings & decor were more 4 star but nice bathroom, very firm beds & everything we needed really. We had a sea view room with a balcony which got the sun at the end of the day. Swallows are nesting everywhere under the eaves above balconies & terraces - beautiful to watch them soaring past, they are a bit noisy first thing in the morning but seem to keep the mosquitos down.
reviews.title: Perfect for an early season getaway!

reviews.text: The beach was breathtaking - directly in front of the hotel with white sand and clear waters. The sea was slightly chilly early May (12 degrees) but good for snorkelling and we saw huge shoals of tiny silver fish, pretty blue & yellow striped fish, crabs, jellyfish, spiky urchins & an octopus in the sea grass beds just off shore. There are several showers to use along the beach and plenty of sun beds & fixed sun umbrellas equipped with a bell you can use to summon a waiter to take food & drink orders (recommend the Club sandwich for lunch as delicious & comes with homemade chips so enough for 2). If you are full board then lunch & alcoholic drinks are pretty pricey, but the Greek house white wine is really very good.
reviews.title: Relaxing atmosphere in lovely area

reviews.text: We found that a warm-ish breeze picked up late morning which made the sea a bit choppy but you can escape the breeze around the pool on the wide & comfortable sun loungers – all the sun beds around the pool were taken up quite quickly for this reason even though the hotel wasn’t very busy when we were there. Pool is lovely - salt water fed directly from the sea I think so just a few degrees warmer.
reviews.title: Gorgeous hotel in stunning location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Spa was very nice & uses Elemis products, my husband had a great back massage - it's about £50 for a massage. There was one tennis court across road too which was good & hotel lends out rackets & balls free of charge.
reviews.title: Relaxing stay

reviews.text: First, we arrived there and the doormen immediately offered their service. They came immediately, smiled and were very very kind. They took our luggage and walked us to reception. The receptionist ladies were outstanding, very kind and smiled. Level of hospitality- 10 out of 10. Georgia and Irini were extremely kind and helpful with everything. They were kind and smiled all the time and ready to assist at all times. All the employees were extremely kind and smiled all the time. Always helpful and that's the way a hospitality company should operate. I was impressed with them. Amazing people. Everybody from the maids to the waiters and managers was extremely hands-on and polite. They were available at all times for us no matter how busy it was. The waiters did everything, whatever we requested they did. They were fast and professional. Their uniforms were neat and clean. Their dress code was perfect. Obviously the trainings they have are of a very high standard.
reviews.title: The paradise on earth you MUST visit...)

reviews.text: Exterior: the parking lot was amazingly beautiful, so green and having so many beautiful flowers everywhere. The building outside looks like a big mansion and it is indeed pretty. The palms and all the greenery just make it so beautiful and clean. The balconies and all the facilities there were just like heaven. The beach was amazing- clean and calm. All the facilities were new. The beach was like a private beach of the hotel. Just breathtaking. Crystal clear water and so many palm trees everywhere. So beautiful, indeed.
reviews.title: Peaceful

reviews.text: Interior: The lobby, restaurants and spa are stunning. I was amazed how beautiful they were. The wall with the water running on it in the spa is a great idea and really impressed me. So creative and splendid. All necessary facilities could be found there. The rooms were a bit too plain for such a hotel. I had higher expectations of them prior to my visit, plus you could hear everything in all other rooms almost on the floor. So the isolation should be better. I heard al babies crying all the time and couples fighting there, which is absolutely bad. The TV, lamps and bathroom were okay, but the beds and some of the colors inside weren't matching at all. So it looked kind of kitsch in a bad way (I mean why bright red color on earth with some figures on it), absolutely a horrendous and tasteless combination. Other than this, the balconies were great, the atmosphere was calm. The ambience was great in the restaurants- the music was pleasant and quiet. The internet connection was relatively fast. The toilets were clean and smelled nice. The smell in the whole hotel was great. The smell in the yard was great too thanks to the flowers.
reviews.title: Fantastic

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Customer retention methods: The staff was very very friendly. The maids were giving food gifts every night. I found it amazing, that they would bring a letter or announcement to your room with food gifts every night. I think the idea is amazing and I loved it. It definitely makes you feel special. They also offered us free champagne as soon as we arrived there, as a welcome drink , while we are seated waiting for them to register us in the system. It was great. Really well-thought of. Excellent!
reviews.title: Amazing

reviews.text: I could sleep very very well there. I also think that the climate is very good for sleeping in Greece. (plus the smell of sea next to you). Everything was very very clean and 90% of the facilities were new and expensive. The location was great, the quality of the food was amazing as well. The different thematic food nights were amazing- such as seafood theme night or other themes. Just continue this way! I found it amazing. The food was warm and always well-prepared. The presentation of the food was great. Its taste was amazing too. Everything was fresh. The smell of the food was great too. There were many alternatives a person could choose from.
reviews.title: The best location ever!
